text:
ALBION System texts (ENGLISH)
*** Party member portraits ***
%s (LP:%d, SP:%d) Give %s to %s Give gold to %s Give food to %s {INK 006}%s has no space left! {INK 006}%s cannot carry that much gold! {INK 006}%s cannot carry that many rations!
*** Party member pop-up menu ***
Character screen Use magic Make leader Talk to Toggle {INK 006}Does not know any spells yet! {INK 006}Cannot talk right now! {INK 006}Mellthas cannot speak. {INK 006}Cannot lead the party now! {INK 006}This backpack is not available now!
*** New active member selector ***
Who should lead the party now? {INK 006}This person cannot lead the party! {INK 006}Somebody MUST lead the party!
*** Map pop-up menu ***
Talk to Examine Manipulate Use item Take {INK 002}Travel on foot {INK 002}Map {INK 002}Rest {INK 002}Wait {INK 002}Main menu (this one also appears in the combat pop-up menu) Environment Person
{INK 006}Cannot carry that much! {INK 006}No space left! {INK 006}It's too dangerous here! Use which item? This item doesn't work here. This word doesn't work here.
{INK 006}Too far away. {INK 006}Too far away to talk to. {INK 006}Too far away to touch. {INK 006}Blocked. {INK 006}Too far away. {INK 006}Blocked.
This person is asleep! This person speaks a language {LEAD}{NAME} doesn't understand. These people do not speak the same languange. Wait for how many hours? Really rest?
*** Inventory item pop-up menu ***
Drop Learn spell Examine Drink Activate spell Read Activate Sell Use {INK 006}Not during combat! %s has no space left!
*** Inventory screen ***
Leave character screen Backpack Character screen 1 Character screen 2 Character screen 3 I II III Damage : %d Protection : %d Weight : %d Kg Carried weight : %ld of %ld g
*** Items ***
%s Put down %s Swap %s with %s {INK 006}This space is occupied! Add {INK 006}%s (%d.%u gold) %s (%d.%u gold)
*** Item types ***
Armor Helmet Shoes Shield Close-range weapon Long-range weapon Ammo Document Spell scroll Drink Amulet Breast pin Ring Valuable Tool Key Normal Magical item Special item Transportation Lockpick Torch
*** Gold / food ***
%d.%u gold %d rations Gold Rations Throw away Throw how much gold away? Really throw the gold away? Throw how many rations away? Really throw the rations away? Take how much gold? Take how many rations?
*** Locks ***
Lock Pick the lock Open the lock {LEAD}{NAME} picked the lock! This lock cannot be picked! {LEAD}{NAME} triggered a trap but managed to evade it! {LEAD}{NAME} triggered a trap! {LEAD}{NAME} opened the lock! {LEAD}{NAME} picked the lock with a lockpick! This is not the right key. You cannot open the lock with this item. {LEAD}{NAME} cannot pick this lock!
*** High-level text commands ***
he she it
him her it
his her its
man woman creature
// POST-RELEASE CHANGE 1.38 him her it
*** Race names ***
Terran Iskai Celt Kenget Kamulos
Dji Cantos Mahino Decadent Umajo
Monster
*** Class names ***
Pilot Scientist Warrior Dji-Kas mage
Druid Enlightened One Technician
Oqulo Kamulos Warrior
*** Racist insults ***
UNUSED
*** Class insults ***
UNUSED
*** Automapper icons (2...17) ***
Riddle-mouth Teleporter Spinner Trap Trap door Special Monster Closed door Open door Merchant Tavern Closed chest Exit Open chest Trash heap Person (Message 184 in this sequence is the Goto-point, which is a special case.) Event
*** Inventory messages ***
Has no charges left! Wrong class! Wrong spell area! No-one knows this spell class! This spell is already known! This spell's level is too high! {SUBJ}{NAME} learned the spell! Item is broken! Throw how many items away? {INK 006}This is a vital item! Really throw this item away? Really throw these items away? {INK 006}This item is cursed! {INK 006}Cannot be unequipped during combat! Take how many items? {INK 006}Cannot be unequipped during combat! {INK 006}You cannot equip this item! {INK 006}This item is broken! {INK 006}This character has the wrong class for this item! {INK 006}This character has the wrong gender for this item! {INK 006}Not enough hands free! {INK 006}This item is already activated! Who should drink this?
*** Tactical window ***
Combat Do nothing Attack Move Use magic Flee Use magic item Advance party {INK 002}Observe {INK 002}End combat {INK 002}Start round! {INK 006}Cannot attack! {INK 006}Cannot cause damage! {INK 006}Unable to move! {INK 006}Cannot get away! {INK 006}Party has already advanced!
*** Spell names for class 0 ***
Thorn snare DELETED DELETED Hurry View of life
Frost splinter Frost crystal Frost avalanche Light healing Blinding spark
Blinding ray Blinding storm Sleep spores Thorn trap Remove trap
DELETED Heal intoxication Heal blindness Heal poisoning Fungification
Light
*** Spell names for class 1 ***
Regeneration Map view Lifebringer Teleporter Healing
Quick withdrawal DELETED DELETED Goddess's Wrath Irritation
Recuperation
*** Spell names for class 2 ***
Berserk Banish demon Banish demons Demon exodus Small fireball
Magic shield Healing Boasting Shock Panic
DELETED
*** Spell names for class 3 ***
Fireball Lightning strike Fire rain Thunderbolt Fire hail
Thunderstorm Lightning trap Big lightning trap Lightning mine Big lightning mine
Steal life Steal magic Personal protection Kamulos's Gaze Remove trap
*** Spell names for class 4 ***
UNUSED
*** Spell names for class 5 ***
Panic Poison breeze Irritation Plague breeze
*** Spell names for class 6 ***
UNUSED
*** Magic spell selector messages ***
{INK 006}Cannot be cast here and now! Needs %u spell-points {INK 006}Not strong enough to cast this spell! {INK 006}Needs %u SP and %u LP
*** Combat messages ***
{INK 006}Long-range weapon has no ammo! Attack whom? {INK 006}No targets for attack! {INK 006}No targets in range! Move where? {INK 006}Nowhere to move! {INK 006}Move was blocked! {COMB}{NAME} is moving. {COMB}{NAME} is fleeing! {COMB}{NAME} is attacking {VICT}{NAME} with {WEAP}! {VICT}{NAME} cannot be hurt! Attack repelled! {COMB}{NAME} makes critical hit! {VICT}{NAME} receives {DAMG} damage! No damage done! {COMB}{NAME} misses {HIS } victim! {COMB}{NAME} misses! {COMB}{NAME} has used up {HIS } ammunition! {COMB}{NAME} attacks {VICT}{NAME}! {COMB}{NAME} triggered a trap! %s is broken!
*** Magic ***
Cast spell on which member? Cast spell on which monster? Cast spell on which row of monsters? Cast spell on whose item? Cast spell on which item? %s casts %s! {INK 006}This is not a magical item! {INK 006}Item has no charges left. Cast spell on what tactical square? %s casts %s with %s! Teleport who? Teleport where? This monster cannot be teleported! The teleport target is already occupied! {INK 006}This spell only works in 3D-maps! {INK 006}Nobody is tired! %s managed to completely deflect the spell! %s was not able to deflect the spell! %s managed to partially deflect the spell! This spell has no effect on %s! {SUBJ}{NAME} used life points for magic! {COMB}{NAME}'s spell does not hit anybody!
*** Requesters ***
OK Close window Enter number: Enter word: Yes No
*** Dialogue ***
{INK 002}"The party seems to be complete!" Offer which item? {INK 006}This is a vital item! {INK 002}"I cannot say anything about this." {INK 002}"I can't tell you anything about this, Tom." {INK 002}"I'm not interested in this item." {INK 002}"Thanks, but I think I'd rather not join you." {INK 002}"Alright. I'll leave." {INK 002}"Farewell!" {INK 002}"See you, Tom." {INK 002}"Greetings." {INK 002}"Hi, Tom. What's up?" {INK 002}"I don't understand that." {INK 002}"I don't understand that, Tom." What do you know about...? What do you know about this item...? Would you like to join us? I would like you to leave us. It's been nice talking to you! What's your profession?
*** Chest screen ***
Exit chest screen Chest You can't put it back!
*** Door screen ***
Exit door screen
*** Apres combat screen ***
Exit combat screen Items left behind Do you want to leave the rest of the items? {INK 006}You've left a vital item!
*** After combat ***
No-one gained any experience. Everybody in the party gains %u experience points.
*** Places (shops etc.) ***
There are no training points left. {INK 002}"There is nothing I can teach you now." {INK 002}"By how many points do you want to improve your skill?" {LEAD}{NAME} takes intensive training. {INK 002}"Who do you want me to heal?" {INK 002}"This person doesn't need healing!" {INK 002}"How many life points do you want me to heal?" {SUBJ}{NAME}'s life points have been restored. {INK 002}"Whose cursed items do you want me to remove?" {INK 002}"This person does not carry any cursed items!" {INK 002}"None of you carries any cursed items!" {SUBJ}{NAME}'s cursed items have been removed! {INK 002}"Which item do you want me to examine?" {INK 006}This item has already been examined! The item has been examined, information is now available. Which item do you want to be recharged? {INK 006}This item is already fully charged! {INK 006}This item cannot be recharged anymore! Restore how many charges? This item has been charged with magical energy. {INK 002}"How many rations do you want to buy?" The rations have been bought. Repair which item? {INK 006}This item is not broken! The item has been repaired. Exit merchant screen Merchant Buy how many items? The items have been bought. {INK 006}This is too expensive! {INK 006}{INVE}{NAME} has no space left! {INK 006}The merchant has no storage room left! Sell how many items? The items have been sold. {INK 006}This is a useless item. {INK 006}You cannot sell broken things! Buy {INK 002}"That'll be %d.%u coins. Do you want to buy it?" {INK 002}"I'll give you %d.%u coins for that. Do you want to sell it?" The party does not have enough gold! Gold(all) Total gold: %ld.%u {LEAD}{NAME} and {HIS } companions are led to their rooms where they spend a peaceful night. Heal which condition? {SUBJ}{NAME} is healed! {INK 002}"No-one in this party needs healing!" {INK 002}"No-one in your party can learn my kind of magic." {INK 002}"Learn which spell?"
*** Camp screen ***
Nobody in the party is tired! The party rests till dawn. The party rests for eight hours. {SUBJ}{NAME} cannot recuperate. {HE } has no food left!
*** Conditions ***
Unconscious Poisoned Ill Exhausted Paralyzed Fleeing Intoxicated Blind Panicking Asleep Insane Irritated
*** Left Inventory 1 ***
{INVE}{NAME} ({SEXC}), %u years old, {RACE}, {CLAS}, level %d. Life points Spell points Experience points Training points
*** Left Inventory 2 ***
Attributes Skills
*** Left Inventory 3 ***
Conditions Languages Temporary spells %d%% (%u hours) Combat positions Change combat positions Swap %s and %s Position %s
*** Attributes ***
Strength Intelligence Dexterity Speed Stamina Luck Magic resistance Magic talent
*** Skills ***
Close range combat Long range combat Critical hit Lockpicking
*** Attribute abbreviations ***
STR INT DEX SPD STA LUC M-R M-T
*** Skill abbreviations ***
CLO LON CRI L-P
*** Game languages ***
Terran Iskai Celtic
*** Temporary spell names ***
Attack Protection Anti-Magic
*** Examine item 1 window ***
More... More information Type Weight %d g Damage Protection
*** Examine item 2 window ***
Skill tax 1 Skill tax 2 None LP-Maximum bonus SP-Maximum bonus Attribute bonus Skill bonus Spell Enchantments
*** Main menu ***
Main menu New game Continue game Load game Save game Options View intro Credits Quit game Do you really want to quit? Which saved game do you want to load? Save on which position? Do you really want to overwrite this saved game? Please enter a name for this saved game: Do you really want to start a new game? (Empty position) No saved games found! {INK 006}{BIG }{CNTR} Not enough room on your hard drive!
*** Options ***
Music volume FX volume 3D window size Combat detail level Combat text delay
*** Special item activation texts ***
The compass has been activated! The monster eye has been activated! The clock has been activated!
*** Combat effect texts ***
%s has been magically accelerated! %s magical acceleration is over! %s is frozen! %s is not frozen anymore! %s has been blinded! %s is not blind anymore! %s has gone berserk! %s is no longer berserk!
*** Condition texts ***
{INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} is unconscious! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} has been poisoned! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} is ill! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} is exhausted! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} is unable to move! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} has fled! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} is intoxicated! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} has been blinded! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} is panicking! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} is asleep! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} has gone insane! {INK 006}{SUBJ}{NAME} is irritated!
*** Various messages ***
{INK 006}Is too hurt to be healed! {INK 006}{CNTR}{BIG }{SUBJ}{NAME} is sick,^^{NORS}and {HE } feels {HIS } body being permanently damaged! {INK 006}{CNTR}{BIG }Death ends the journey.^^{NORS}Everyone in the party is fatally wounded. They die soon afterwards. Exit screen Point has been marked! {INK 002}{SUBJ}{NAME} is carrying too much! {SUBJ}{NAME} was lucky and escaped the trap! {INK 006}Is unconscious! Everyone is getting tired! Everybody is exhausted! {INK 006}{CNTR}{BIG }Attack! {INK 002}{CNTR}{BIG }%s has reached level %u!^{NORS}^Life points: %u^Spell points: %u^Additional training points: %u^Attacks per round: %u {INK 002}{CNTR}{BIG }%s has reached level %u!^{NORS}^Life points: %u^Additional training points: %u^Attacks per round : %u %s has reached the maximum character level!
*** UNUSED *** Can be used by: {INK 006}Doesn't speak the right language!
